content.raw: Anyway, I switched from a 6 core, 12 thread laptop with 4GB Quadro to a 4 core, 8 thread desktop with a 6GB 1060 and the difference is huge.  On the laptop, I would see high cpu utilization from xorg and gnome-shell as well; I have to assume that had to do with running out of VRAM, as I don’t see it on the desktop at all.  Might want to recommend 6GB as a minimum requirement instead?
